title: Flex Consumable
description: Abstraction wrapper for managing any consumable item in any game. For example: stamina, magicka, health, fuel, electricity, weight, durability etc.
longDescription:
Original idea was to provide abstraction wrapper which helps to manage consumable stuff in any game.

For example stamina/magicka/health for main character or NPC, fuel for car, electricity for some building, inventory items when their quantity can increase/decrease, some in game shop items when their quantity can increase/decrease, in game money such as silver/gold coins or whatever currency represented in your game etc.

So this class providing necessary functionality for help in managing of ALL such consumables in ANY games.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • Storage for all in game consumable items
  • Asynchronous/Non-Asynchronous Consuming/Restoring of consumable value
  • One actor can have multiple consumable in storage
  • Updating specific value for specific consumable of specific actor in storage
  • Adding/Removing new actor/actor consumable to storage
  • Retrieving specific consumable of specific actor from storage

Number of Blueprints: 1 (class and functions made on c++ and exposed to use in blueprints)

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Documentation: Inside FlexConsumable .h file inside plugin "source" folder

Important note: functionality originally made for using withing c++, it have exposed functionality to blueprints within unreal engine macros
